label: Fine woody debris (2.5-7.5 cm)
description: carbon storage in intermediate fine woody debris with intersection diameters >=2.5 cm and <7.6 cm

label: Coarse woody debris (>= 7.6 cm)
description: carbon storage in coarse woody debris with intersection diameters >=2.5 cm and <7.6 cm

label: Standing dead trees (>= 2.5 cm)
description: lower bound estimate of carbon storage in standing dead trees with diameters at breast height >=2.5 cm

label: Dead stems (< 2.5 cm)
description: lower bound estimate of carbon storage in standing dead stems with diameters at breast height <2.5 cm

label: Aboveground live trees (>= 2.5 cm)
description: aboveground carbon storage in live standing trees with diameters at breast height >=2.5 cm

label: Belowground live trees (>= 2.5 cm)
description: belowground carbon storage in live standing trees with diameters at breast height >=2.5 cm

label: Live trees (>= 2.5 cm)
description: total carbon storage in live standing trees with diameters at breast height >=2.5 cm

label: Aboveground live stems (< 2.5 cm)
description: aboveground carbon storage in live standing trees with diameters at breast height <2.5 cm

label: Belowground live stems (< 2.5 cm)
description: belowground carbon storage in live standing trees with diameters at breast height <2.5 cm

label: Live stems (< 2.5 cm)
description: total carbon storage in live standing trees with diameters at breast height <2.5 cm

label: Live F. pennsylvanica (>= 2.5 cm)
description: hypothetical total carbon storage in large diameter (>= 2.5 cm) Fraxinus pennsylvanica trees if there had not been mortality due to the Emerald Ash Borer

label: Standing dead F. pennsylvanica (>= 2.5 cm)
description: lower bound estimate of actual carbon storage in standing dead Fraxinus pennsylvanic trees with diameters at breast height >=2.5 cm

label: Herbaceous biomass
description: total carbon storage of all living herbaceous biomass in the understory layer

label: Mixed biomass
description: total carbon storage of living herbaceous biomass in the understory layer for all species except Phalaris arundinacea and Humulus japonius

label: P. arundinacea biomass
description: total carbon storage of living Phalaris arundinacea biomass in the understory layer

label: H. japonicus biomass
description: total carbon storage of living Humulus japonicus biomass in the understory layer

label: Herbaceous litter
description: total carbon storage of standing herbaceous litter in the understory layer

label: Fine woody debris (< 2.5 cm)
description: total carbon storage of fine woody debris (<2.5 cm) in the understory layer

label: Fine woody debris C:N ratio
description: carbon to nitrogen ratio of fine woody debris (<2.5 cm) in the understory layer

label: Herbaceous litter C:N ratio
description: carbon to nitrogen ratio of standing herbaceous litter in the understory layer

label: Herbaceous biomass C:N ratio
description: carbon to nitrogen ratio of all living herbaceous biomass in the understory layer

label: Mineral-associated organic carbon
description: mineral-associated organic carbon stock in surface soils (0-30 cm)

label: Particulate organic carbon
description: particulate organic carbon stock in surface soils (0-30 cm)

label: Soil organic carbon
description: total soil organic carbon stock in surface soils (0-30 cm), which is the sum of particulate and mineral-associated organic carbon

label: Soil inorganic carbon
description: total soil inorganic carbon stock in surface soils (0-30 cm)

label: Total soil carbon
description: total soil carbon stock in surface soils (0-30 cm), which is the sum of total soil organic and inorganic carbon

label: Aboveground woody biomass
description: total aboveground carbon stock in living woody biomass, including large trees (>= 2.5 cm) and small stems (< 2.5 cm)

label: Belowground woody biomass
description: total belowground carbon stock in living woody biomass, including large trees (>= 2.5 cm) and small stems (< 2.5 cm)

label: Total live vegetation
description: total carbon stock in living woody biomass, including large trees (>= 2.5 cm) and small stems (< 2.5 cm)

label: Total dead vegetation
description: total carbon stock in dead vegetation, including large standing dead trees (>= 2.5 cm), small dead stems (<2.5 cm), coarse woody debris (>= 7.6 cm), and all fine woody debris (<7.6 cm)

label: Total vegetation
description: total carbon stock in living and dead vegetation

label: Total ecosystem
description: total ecosystem carbon stock, which is the sum of the total vegetation and total soil carbon stocks

label: Herbaceous layer richness
description: total number of species in the herbaceous layer, including small trees below breast height (1.37 m or 4.5 ft)

label: Tree layer richness
description: total number of species in the tree layer, which includes all trees above breast height (1.37 m or 4.5 ft)

label: Total richness
description: total number of species in herbaceous layer and tree layer, which accounts for potential overlap between the layers
